title: rFSM Test Specification
description: Test specification for rSFM test runner.

file.description: The relative path to the SCXML file or the FSM to test.\nCan be null, in this case the test-runner needs additional a scxml-file.

events.description: The sequence of events to test.

delay_ms.description: Delay in milliseconds after the event was send.

shall_reach_state.description: Optional state to reach after the event.\nUse #stop to check for termination of FSM.

shall_send_event.description: Optional event to receive from FSM after the event.

final_configuration.description: The list of states that are reached as FSM was terminated.

timeout_milliseconds.description: Maximal time the FSM shall run.
